title: Pilot-Aided Joint Time Synchronization and Channel Estimation for OTFS
authors:
Jiazheng Sun, Peng Yang, Xianbin Cao, Zehui Xiong, Haijun Zhang, and
  Tony Q. S. Quek
abstract:
This letter proposes a pilot-aided joint time synchronization and channel
estimation (JTSCE) algorithm for orthogonal time frequency space (OTFS)
systems. Unlike existing algorithms, JTSCE employs a maximum length sequence
(MLS) rather than an isolated signal as the pilot. Distinctively, JTSCE
explores MLS's autocorrelation properties to estimate timing offset and channel
delay taps. After obtaining delay taps, closed-form expressions of Doppler and
channel gain for each propagation path are derived. Simulation results indicate
that, compared to its counterpart, JTSCE achieves better bit error rate
performance, close to that with perfect time synchronization and channel state
information.
subjects: Electrical Engineering and Systems Science/Signal Processing
